context.original_query: Query 1: Open https://www.inkers.ai in a new tab, and click on Demo Button. Inform Decision that whenever it calls any tool, it will immediately return the broswer state, which will have id's for buttons and things it can interact with. So it will have to save them for reuse for next step.

options: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

memory.original_query: Query 1: Open https://www.inkers.ai in a new tab, and click on Demo Button. Inform Decision that whenever it calls any tool, it will immediately return the broswer state, which will have id's for buttons and things it can interact with. So it will have to save them for reuse for next step.
memory.summarizer_summary: The website [Inkers.ai](https://www.inkers.ai) was opened in a new tab. The "Demo" button was successfully clicked. Furthermore, the interactive elements of the page, including element IDs, were retrieved for future use. The Decision module is aware that it should save the browser state and element IDs after each tool call for reuse in subsequent steps.

perception.result_requirement: Open Inkers.ai in a new tab, click the Demo button, and ensure Decision module is informed to save browser state with element IDs after each tool use.
perception.reasoning: The original query requires opening a URL and interacting with a button on the webpage. This requires tool use and planning to accomplish. The instructions to inform the Decision module about saving the browser state needs to be incorporated into the plan.
perception.local_reasoning: The initial query is a set of instructions that can only be accomplished through a series of tool executions and a subsequent memory of the element IDs. Decision needs to plan to open the browser and then click on a button.

data.description: Open https://www.inkers.ai in a new tab.

perception.result_requirement: Click the 'Demo Button' on Inkers.ai after opening the page and ensure the Decision module saves browser state and element IDs for future steps.
perception.reasoning: The first step of opening the website was successful. The next step is to click the 'Demo Button'. Decision needs to plan this next step and incorporate saving the browser state and element IDs.
perception.local_reasoning: Only the website has been opened so far. The primary goal of clicking the demo button is yet to be achieved.

perception.solution_summary: Ready to click the Demo button.

perception.result_requirement: Open Inkers.ai in a new tab and click the Demo button, informing Decision to save browser state with element IDs.

perception.instruction_to_summarize: Summarize the actions taken. The website Inkers.ai was opened, the demo button was clicked, and the interactive elements were successfully retrieved.

summarizer_snapshots.summary_output: The website [Inkers.ai](https://www.inkers.ai) was opened in a new tab. The "Demo" button was successfully clicked. Furthermore, the interactive elements of the page, including element IDs, were retrieved for future use. The Decision module is aware that it should save the browser state and element IDs after each tool call for reuse in subsequent steps.

session.final_summary: The website [Inkers.ai](https://www.inkers.ai) was opened in a new tab. The "Demo" button was successfully clicked. Furthermore, the interactive elements of the page, including element IDs, were retrieved for future use. The Decision module is aware that it should save the browser state and element IDs after each tool call for reuse in subsequent steps.
